com.flowpowered.react.engine

Class OverlappingPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.engine.OverlappingPair

  • public class OverlappingPair
extends Object
    Represents a pair of two bodies that are overlapping during the broad-phase collision detection. It is created when the two bodies start to overlap and is destroyed when they do not overlap anymore. This class contains a contact manifold that stores all the contact points between the two bodies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new overlapping pair from the first and second body.
